org.integratedmodelling.thinklab.api.modelling.factories
Interface IModelFactory

public interface IModelFactory

The model factory contains the register of all model objects and namespaces. It's capable of reconstructing dependency structure and source code of all objects. It can load model definitions from resources and release objects on a namespace basis. The paradigm "one resource, one namespace" is mandatory and enforced.

Author:
Ferdinando

getCoverage

IContext getCoverage(IModel model,
                     IKBox kbox,
                     ISession session)
Return a context that describes the coverage of a particular model in a given kbox along all applicable dimensions. It will be the union of the contexts of all the realized models found in that kbox.
